com.punchline.javalib.entities.components

Class StatBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.punchline.javalib.entities.components.StatBar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component

    public abstract class StatBar
extends java.lang.Object
implements Component
    Base class for Components such as a health bar, magic meter, or any other stat with a max value.
    Author:
    Nathaniel

      • setMaxValue

        public void setMaxValue(double max)
        Sets the max value of the StatBar.
        Parameters:
        max - The desired value. If negative, nothing will happen.
